name: Contour Screenplay File
summary: Learn about .CONTOUR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CONTOUR files are saved in an XML format. They can also be exported to an .RTF file using the software.
The Contour philosophy defines screenplays from four main questions:
What is he trying to accomplish?
Who is trying to stop him?
NOTE: Mariner Software has discontinued Contour.

description: Movie script created by Contour, a program used to create screenplay outlines; stores written ideas according to the Contour story development philosophy; used for storing the step-by-step screenplay structure of a movie.
